features.name: User Registration
features.description: New user registration through an email address.

features.name: User Login
features.description: User can login via valid email address and password.

features.name: Password Reset
features.description: User can reset a forget password to recover their account.

features.name: Create Organization
features.description: User can create an organization to house teams of people.

features.name: Join Organization
features.description: User can request to join an organization.

features.name: Create Team
features.description: User can create a limited number of teams with an organization.

features.name: Join Team
features.description: User request other people to join a team.
